translation.en: ♪ You get me closer to God ♪

translation.en: What...
What's that for?
Uh, wait, wait, wait, Sterling, um...
My virginity is a gift that I want to give to my future wife,

Horny?
Tempted.

I think we should pray...
for restraint. Okay? All right.

and we strive to be good and gracious

translation.en: in the face of the--
the devil.
John 3:16: "God so loved the world
translation.it: Dal Vangelo secondo Giovanni, 3:16: "Dio ha tanto amato il mondo

translation.en: that He gave His one and only son

translation.it: perché chiunque crede in lui non muoia,

Wait... uh, what?
Whoever believes in Him will have eternal life.

Of course.
Well, then you shall have eternal life.

translation.en: "The Lord is my shepherd.
I shall not be in want."
"I shall not be in want."
Oh, man. I really love you. [chuckles]
First Peter 4:8...
"And above all, love each other... deeply

-[groans ecstatically] -...a multitude... of... sin..."
What did you think?
-I thought it was really dope. -Mm-hm.

but it's still, like, a lot cooler

See ya.

I know this goes without saying,
-but let's keep this private. -[car door shuts]
Sterling, are you sure we feel okay about this?

translation.en: -We sinned against God. -[car engine starts]
But we love each other, and love covers over a multitude of sins.

And I really, really love you...

maybe this is the year I-- I-- I do it.
I stop being the "everything but" slut and seal the deal.

...it's gonna get awesome.

You have nothing to say?

-You? -Yeah.

-[giggles] I know. -Yeah. Oh, my God.

Okay, I... [giggles] you're-- I guess you're the sluttier twin now.

Okay, buck teeth. Put your hands on the car.

I keep it professional.

translation.it: La metà. - Cosa? - Metà lavoro, metà dei soldi.

translation.en: -Oh. Um... Yeah, okay. -Wait, are you wussing out?
No, I'm not a wuss. -Good, neither am I. -Good.
-Good! Great! -Awesome!
After this, can we get Chick-fil-A? I am so hungry.

-Half. -Yes, we want half.
Y'all are cute.
That your daddy's shotgun you got there?

I like the shell lifter placement of the Mossberg better.
Now, what I really prefer is this Glock 19.

Y'all a piece of work, I give you that.

And then why don't we just plan to meet sometime soon and discuss next week's devotional reading.

translation.en: And yes, you can have extra gummy bears, that'll be an extra 75 cents.
translation.it: E per la dose extra di orsetti gommosi, sono 75 centesimi.

translation.en: Do you sing if I tip? No, I will not sing.
translation.it: - Se ti do la mancia, mi canti qualcosa? - No.

translation.en: [Blair] You're no fun.
-What is--? -Hey! What you waitin' on?
Come on.
You, uh... got the cash?
Yup.
Turn around, please.
Thank you.
All right.
-[ringtone on cell phone] -Oh, shit.
Yeah. Go for Bowser.
No. No. No. No. Yolanda.
Don't give it to that bitch-ass, Terrance.
translation.it: Non a quello stronzo di Terrance.

translation.en: I'll find him.
I know.
The Men's Parlor. I know.
Because I'll find--
You heard what I said, didn't you?
[whispering] Shit.
Hey. Put that back. What are you doing? Here you go.
translation.it: Che fai? Mettilo giù. Ecco qua.

translation.en: Count it, Sterling. [clears throat]
-That's great. Thank you. It's good. -All right.
Good doing business with you.
-As the old saying goes, "Bye." -Uh...
Hey, Bowser.
Yeah.
You look... manly.
Oily... Uh...
Vehicular-ly inclined.
Anyway, do you know how much it might cost us to get that fixed? Roughly?
translation.it: Hai idea di quanto ci costerebbe farlo sistemare, più o meno?

translation.en: Oily, huh? Yeah.
Well, as a man who's crashed many cars,
translation.it: Beh, ne ho distrutte di auto in vita mia.

translation.en: I'd say you'd probably run yourself about 5K worth of damage here.
translation.it: Direi che probabilmente ci sono danni per 5.000 dollari.

translation.en: Yeah.
Um... Do you have any more jobs?
Ah, jeez, if I had any more jobs,
if I had more jobs-- Look...
I like you girls. I do.
You're fast as hell.
You run like a deer. It was amazing.
translation.it: Corri come un lampo, è fantastico.

translation.en: And you, you're a freakishly good shot.
But I've got rent to pay. I can't split my rewards on folks I can nab on my own, see?
translation.it: Ma devo pagare l'affitto. Non posso dividere i miei guadagni.

translation.en: Hey, we get it.
Yeah, well, getting it is half the battle, ah?
translation.it: Bene, siete già a metà dell'opera.

translation.en: So, what do you want to do now?
Go to the Men's Parlor?
That secret club of which we know the exact location?
translation.it: Il club segreto di cui conosciamo la posizione esatta?

translation.en: Hey, uh, what's the address over there?
The address alone won't get you very far.
-And why is that? -You need us to get in it.
It-- um-- It's in this country club and they only cater to this specific clientele, it's--
translation.it: Si trova in un country club con una clientela molto specifica.

translation.en: -White people. -Blair.
What? It's true!
I don't think it's written in stone, but...
translation.it: Non c'è una vera e propria regola, ma...

translation.en: actually, it--it might be.
So, unfortunately these places have some outdated policies that don't--
translation.it: Purtroppo quei posti hanno regole antiquate, non riflettono...

translation.en: Okay. Enough with the Black history, Reverend Al Sharpton. I get it.
translation.it: Basta con la storia dei neri, reverendo Sharpton. Ho capito.

translation.en: They're racist.
-Right. -Yes.
Yeah, so you can have the address for,
translation.it: Quindi, se vuoi, possiamo darti l'indirizzo per...

translation.en: I don't know, say... a hundred,
or you could have personal whitey escorts
translation.it: Oppure potresti avere delle accompagnatrici bianche

translation.en: -for three thou-- -Five.
Five thousand dollars.
If you deliver me John Stevens,
translation.it: Se mi fate avere John Stevens,

translation.en: y'all will get paid.
John Stevens, dude.
It can't be April's dad. There's gotta be a bajillion John Stevenses.
translation.it: No, non il padre di April. Sarà un omonimo.

translation.en: Bajillion John Stevenses that belong to Men's Parlor?
translation.it: Uno che va al Men's Parlour?

translation.en: April's dad is the creep on our eighth grade trip to Jekyll Island
translation.it: È sempre il porco che in terza media ha detto

translation.en: that said I was developing nicely.
Oh, barf. Yes.
I'd love to arrest him and watch April squirm.
translation.it: Sarebbe il massimo. Anche per April.

translation.en: Are you wearing my Savage X Fenty bralette again?
translation.it: È il mio bralette Savage X Fenty?

translation.en: I hate you. You'll stink it up with your smelly boobs.
translation.it: Me lo sporchi, ti puzzano le tette.

translation.en: Now's not the time.
Cool. We know John Stevens.
Say again.
Oh, yeah, we brought him in before.
What did the old boy do this time?
Solicitation and battery. Real pillar of his community.
translation.it: Induzione alla prostituzione e aggressione, un uomo per bene.

translation.en: Skipped bail last week, even.
translation.it: E si è dato alla macchia.

translation.en: Having a meeting tonight at The Men's Parlor at 6:00.
translation.it: Ma stasera alle 18 sarà in quel club.

translation.en: My bail bondsman. My bail bondswoman...
translation.it: Il mio contatto... Cioè, la mia...

translation.en: My bail bondsperson got a tip.
translation.it: Insomma, il garante ha avuto una soffiata.

translation.en: Dope.
Let's ride.
-Dope. Let's ride. -Hey! My car.
translation.it: - Forte. Andiamo. - Ehi, andiamo con la mia.

translation.en: Well, this is some Django shit.
Hey, Trevor. Hey, Miles.
Hey, Miss Wesley.
Miss Wesley.
Hey, Miles.
Oh, uh, you guys going to be parking today?
No. He's just dropping us off.
Park down by the service entrance, download Fruit Ninja.
translation.it: Parcheggia all'entrata di servizio e scarica Fruit Ninja.

translation.en: We'll be back with your guy.
What the hell is a "fruit ninja"?
I'm really hoping you have a plan.
translation.it: Spero che tu abbia un piano.

translation.en: Not so much a plan as like a general idea...ish...ment.
translation.it: Non è tanto un piano, quanto un'idea generale. Cioè, circa.

translation.en: Care to enlighten me?
Okay, how about...
we walk into The Men's Parlor like a couple of Lara Crofts.
translation.it: entriamo nel club come due Lara Croft.

translation.en: And then we slip some of my melatonin into Mr. Stevens' drink,
translation.it: Versiamo un po' di melatonina nel cocktail di Stevens,

translation.en: like James Bond and then we grab him--
Or we can clock him in the head with this pistol? You brought a pistol?
translation.it: - Lo stordiamo con la pistola? - Hai una pistola?

translation.en: [woman] Hello, girls...
Hi, Mr. and Mrs. Jenson. Y'all are looking sharp.
translation.it: Signori Jenson, vi vedo in forma.

translation.en: Thank you.
I love that nail color, Mrs. Jenson.
It's like skin color, but prettier.
translation.it: Sembra color pelle, ma più bello.

translation.en: Y'all are too dang sweet.
Tell your mother and daddy we said hello.
Yes, ma'am, and see you Sunday morning bright and early.
Oh, you will.
Aren't they precious? I wish Frank would date one of them.
translation.it: Sono adorabili. Se Frank uscisse con una di loro...

translation.en: I wasn't going to meet up with a bounty hunter unarmed. That's just common sense.
translation.it: Non volevo andare disarmata da un cacciatore di taglie.

translation.en: Stranger danger.
[scoffs] He's not here. It's past six o'clock--
translation.it: Non è qui. E le 18 sono passate...

translation.en: Hey. What are you two doing in here?
Come on, get over here.
-[Blair scoffs] -[Miles] Quick.
Are you two crazy?
That's The "Men's" Parlour.
Neither of you are mens.
Y-- Yeah, obviously.
But, I don't see a Women's Parlour here.
So, we're here in protest. Okay?
♪ Show me what a Women's Parlour looks like ♪
♪ This is what a Women's Parlour looks like! ♪
translation.it: Ecco come sarebbe un Women's Parlour

translation.en: -♪ Show me what a Women's-- ♪ -[interrupting]
Uh-- Uh-- We're looking for John Stevens.
We heard he had a meeting. Know where we can find him?
If I told you, I would lose my job.
translation.it: Se ve lo dicessi, mi licenzierebbero.

translation.en: You know how weird this place is about secrets and traditions.
translation.it: Qua sono fissati con segreti e tradizioni.

translation.en: Hey, Miles.
Miles, we, uh... really...
need your help...
here. So...
All right, he's in the humidor.
It's where a group of guys called The Bourbon Club meet.
translation.it: Lì si riunisce il Bourbon Club.

translation.en: Great. Where is it?
-It's around that corner, but-- -Okay. Thanks, Miles.
Okay, we'll see you later.
Did you see that? I, like, totally seduced him.
[whispering] Focus! I think it's this.
There's nothing here.
Well...
thanks for nothing, Miles.
What are y'all in the mood for?
We got top shelf or... hell, we can all slum it with Beam.
translation.it: Una bella bottiglia... o ci accontentiamo di un Jim Beam?

translation.en: [man] Find that single barrel we like so much from Pigeon Forge. Mm.
translation.it: Trova quel Pigeon Forge che ci piace tanto.

translation.en: Anyway, now y'all gonna have to believe me when I tell y'all...
-that was Gerald. -[man] And now you're tellin' fibs.
[man 3] No, he's not. Girl was there, and the cops were coming
translation.it: - No, è vero. - La polizia stava arrivando

translation.en: and John happened to be at the motel bar.
translation.it: e John si trovava per caso al bar del motel.

translation.en: [chuckles] Gerald asked him to take the fall. Gerald's got rage issues.
translation.it: Si è preso la colpa. Gerald ha problemi di rabbia.

translation.en: Saying you're the one who beat up a whore is a damn big sacrifice.
translation.it: E hai finto di aver picchiato una puttana?

translation.en: He's been my business partner for 18 years. Wife's in hospice care.
translation.it: È mio socio da 18 anni e sua moglie è in un hospice.

translation.en: Ovarian cancer's got her any day now.
I couldn't let Gerald ruin himself in her eyes,
translation.it: Non potevo permettere che lo sapesse.

translation.en: so when she passes, he'll confess.
translation.it: Quando non ci sarà più, Gerald confesserà.

translation.en: And until then, I'm hidin' out.
translation.it: Fino ad allora, me ne sto nascosto.

translation.en: [man 1] Dadgum, you're a good man, John.
[man 2] A lot better than I'd have done, that's for damn sure.
[man 1] Yeah, we know.
[man 2] Hey, I found it. There it is.
-[man 1] Finally. -[men chuckle]
[John] Bring that on in. Mmm.
It's looking good.
Holy shit.
Mr. Stevens was just protecting his fuckboy partner.
translation.it: Stevens stava proteggendo il suo partner.

translation.en: We can't bring him in.
Dude, we need the money.
He didn't do it, it would be wrong. You know this!
translation.it: Non è stato lui, non è giusto!

translation.en: You can be very un-fun sometimes!
translation.it: A volte sei una vera palla!

translation.en: Get out of here! Oh, peach! [chuckles]
I'm a fruit ninja.
He wasn't there.
Goddamn it, I thought you said you knew what you were doin'.
translation.it: Accidenti, pensavo di potermi fidare di voi.

translation.en: We thought that you said that you knew what you were doing.
Yeah, Bowser, so you must of... had some misinformation.
translation.it: Già, Bowser. Forse non eri così ben informato.

translation.en: Shhhit.
Misinformation.
Oh, that's awesome.
That's...
That's, that's it.
That was amazing.
Mmm. I love you.
I love you.
-Oh. Hey, babe. -Hey. How was your day?
It was really good. Did you have a good day?
I had such a good day.
-Okay, yeah... See ya. -Do you--?
-Okay. -See ya. Uh, I go-- I got golf.
You totally just boned.
[sighs] We made love.
You mean you boned, but slower?
That must have been so intense. It was kind of awesome.
translation.it: - Sarà stato intenso. - È stato fantastico.

translation.en: Oh, my God. When he's--
Hi, Sterling.
-Hi, April. -Hi, Blair.
If my--
If I didn't know my fate at this school rested in her cold little condom-wrapper-grabbing hands,
translation.it: Se il mio destino non fosse nelle sue mani di ruba preservativi,

translation.en: I'd feel bad for April about her dad.
I hate her dumb bitch face but... yeah.
translation.it: La odio e ha la faccia da stronza, ma... concordo.

translation.en: If his business partner doesn't confess, does he have to go to jail for him?
translation.it: Se il socio non confessa, John finirà in prigione?

translation.en: She'd have one more thing to pray about, that's for sure.
translation.it: April avrebbe un motivo in più per pregare.

translation.en: Shit. Shit. Shit.
translation.it: SIETE MORTE. MAMMA Merda. Controlla il telefono. Merda!

translation.en: Check your phone. Shit!
-[groans] -[cell phone bleeps]
You don't have to sign who it's from.
Disappointment is beyond what your father and I feel right now.
translation.it: Dire che io e vostro padre siamo delusi sarebbe riduttivo.

translation.en: -We trusted you girls-- -The Volt is so small.
translation.it: - Noi ci... - La Volt è piccola.

translation.en: Oh, you do not interrupt me when I'm talking to you--! You do not interrupt your mother.
translation.it: - Non interrompermi. - Non interrompere tua madre.

translation.en: Took your father's truck without permission. You treated it like trash
translation.it: L'avete preso senza permesso, l'avete distrutto

translation.en: and what's more, you didn't even tell us about crashing it.
translation.it: e non ci avete nemmeno avvisato.

translation.en: You were dishonest and you were irresponsible.
That's right.
We've decided that you two will have to pay for the repairs.
translation.it: Abbiamo deciso che pagherete voi le riparazioni.

translation.en: That's right, you'll have to get jobs.
translation.it: Ebbene sì, dovrete trovarvi un lavoro.

translation.en: [man] And if you can't handle that,
then we will fix the truck with the money we spend sending you to Willingham.
translation.it: lo faremo riparare con i soldi che spendiamo per la vostra retta.

translation.en: Oh, that's good.
See if y'all can handle public school.
[woman] Is that what y'all want? Public school?
Where the principal wears blue jeans,
translation.it: Dove il preside mette i jeans

translation.en: and the classrooms are just one long bench and a chalkboard on wheels.
translation.it: e le aule hanno un unico grande banco e una lavagna a rotelle?

translation.en: -No, ma'am. -Maybe.
Young lady, don't you get smart with me.
Now, are we understood?
[both] Yes, ma'am.
[woman] Well, what are you waiting for? Go.
Go!
-[sighs] I'm just... -Mm.
[sighs] If we leave right now, we can still make our court.
translation.it: Siamo ancora in tempo per il tennis.

translation.en: -[rock music playing] -That's good good good good good good.
-That's good. -[knocking]
-Go away! -Hey.
Or come in.
We need work, Bowser.
And I need a big house with a white picket fence
translation.it: E a me serve una villetta

translation.en: and Tawny Kitaen in the back, cooking me up some pancakes.
translation.it: e Tawny Kitaen che mi prepara i pancake.

translation.en: -That's what I need. -We're serious.
translation.it: e Tawny Kitaen che mi prepara i pancake. Siamo serie.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, I can tell.
Well, I gave you a chance and you didn't catch the skip,
translation.it: Vi ho dato una possibilità e avete fallito.

translation.en: so it doesn't sound promising to me.
You can use us. We have a lot of power in the community.
translation.it: Potresti sfruttare la nostra influenza nella comunità.

translation.en: Like, the rich people community.
[chuckling] Yeah, okay, then.
Find me John Stevens.
You know, solicitation of a prostitute and battery,
that just doesn't sound like John Stevens. Are you sure that the charges are right?
translation.it: Non è da lui. Sicuro che sia andata così?

translation.en: I would hate to put him away if he didn't really do it.
translation.it: Non vorrei catturarlo, se è innocente.

translation.en: Hold it right there.
A bounty hunter catches a guy and collects the bounty.
translation.it: Un cacciatore di taglie cattura e incassa.

translation.en: -Whether he did it-- -Or she...
translation.it: - Che sia stato lui... - O lei.

translation.en: Whether he or she did it is no concern of mine.
translation.it: Che sia stato davvero lui, o lei, non è un problema mio.

translation.en: And if you're real bounty hunters, it shouldn't be any of yours, either.
translation.it: E se siete vere cacciatrici, non è nemmeno un problema vostro.

translation.en: -He knows we're not bounty hunters. -Maybe he doesn't, so just chill.
translation.it: - Ha capito che non lo siamo. - Non per forza, calmati.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, I can do that.
Just soooo chill.
-Just super chill. -Chill.
So chill.
[sniffs] I know you're not really bounty hunters.
-Aw, shit. -Aw, shoot.
I mean, "Come again, dog?"
I ran your plates, kid.
You're the teenage daughters of Anderson and Deborah Wesley
translation.it: Siete figlie di Anderson e Deborah Wesley,

translation.en: of 495 Albemarle Circle.
Before that you were at 716 Margaret Mitchell.
translation.it: Prima abitavate al 716 di Margaret Mitchell.

translation.en: By the way, your mama has six unpaid parking tickets.
translation.it: Vostra mamma ha sei multe non pagate.

translation.en: You post on TikTok 4.2 times a week.
translation.it: Fate 4,2 post su TikTok alla settimana.

translation.en: -Should I go on? -TikTok is an art.
How do you know all of that?
Because I'm good at my job,
which is why I was going to let you get away with this until you deliver me John Stevens.
translation.it: Per questo volevo assecondarvi e farmi consegnare John Stevens.

translation.en: He's a big payday,
but obviously that's beyond your scope.
translation.it: Ma non è alla vostra portata.

translation.en: But you said yourself we're good at this stuff.
translation.it: Ma l'hai detto tu che siamo brave.

translation.en: Did I really say that?
-Yes. -I don't--
Okay, but it just doesn't make sense for me, girls.
translation.it: Comunque sia, ragazze, non mi conviene.

translation.en: It'd be like I was babysitting.
[chuckles] And who wants to see me with a baby? Do you understand? Hell, come on.
translation.it: E chi mi affiderebbe mai un bambino? Forza, andate.

translation.en: Feel free to come by here any time to say hi.
Because y'all crack me up.
Don't arrest John Stevens. We have inside information.
translation.it: Non arrestarlo. Abbiamo informazioni riservate. È innocente.

translation.en: -He's innocent. -Yeah.
Inside information, hm? All right, let's see.
Take a look at that.
Security footage from the night of the arrest.
[Sterling] Oh, my gosh, it's totally him.
This is bonkerballs.
Mr. Stevens did it, that little lying piece of shit.
translation.it: È stato davvero quel pezzo di merda di Stevens.

translation.en: -He beat up that poor woman. -We should have known.
He just happened to be at the bar? Motels don't have bars.
translation.it: Era lì per caso? Non ci sono bar nei motel.

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
God, you're so smart. It's kind of annoying.
translation.it: Sei così sveglia che mi dai fastidio.

translation.en: Okay, we need to find him.
Hey, text Miles and see if he's at The Men's Parlour. Good idea.
translation.it: - Scrivi a Miles, magari è al Parlour. - Buona idea.

translation.en: He said he can't tell me.
-Tell him you'll go on a date with him. -[groans]
He's not there.
Please!
There's no way he's hiding out at home.
How the hell are we gonna find out where he went?
I might have an idea.
You might have an idea or actually have an idea.
No, I have an idea. Let me have my cool, ominous moment. Okay, sorry.
translation.it: - Ce l'ho, ma volevo essere misteriosa. - Ok, scusa.

translation.en: It's just not cool.
Hey, April, we need to talk to you.
The pressures of Fellowship too much already?
translation.it: Sei già stanca di fare la responsabile?

translation.en: I wish I could help.
Oh, bless your heart.
Uh, no, we met with your daddy this week,
translation.it: Sai, avevamo parlato con tuo padre.

translation.en: and he so graciously offered to sponsor our field trip to the soup kitchen.
translation.it: Vuole sponsorizzare la giornata alla mensa dei poveri.

translation.en: What a sweet man.
Yeah, the problem is that funding is due tomorrow
translation.it: Sì, ma ci servono i fondi per domani

translation.en: and we can't seem to find him. Do you know where he is?
You met with him earlier this week? Yeah, Monday. Lovely office.
translation.it: - Gli avete parlato questa settimana? - Sì, lunedì. Bell'ufficio.

translation.en: Gorgeous interior design.
That's funny, because he took his helicopter to Hilton Head
translation.it: Strano, è andato a Hilton Head in elicottero per giocare a golf

translation.en: for a golf retreat ten days ago.
translation.it: Strano, è andato a Hilton Head in elicottero per giocare a golf dieci giorni fa.

translation.en: -Ooh. -Okay... what?
I'll explain later.
Oh. Sorry, did I say this past Monday? I meant the Monday before that. I'm-- [chuckles]
translation.it: Non intendevo lunedì scorso, ma quello prima ancora.

translation.en: -It's been a long day... -Yeah.
...and yeah, my brain's like melted into a puddle, and, yeah.
translation.it: Mi si è fuso il cervello.

translation.en: I don't know what you little tramps think you're up to,
translation.it: Sentite, puttanelle. Non so cosa volete fare,

translation.en: but I know you're lying.
You do not want to mess with me, honey.
translation.it: Non ti conviene farmi arrabbiare, tesoro.

translation.en: Just need the money to continue to spread Christ's love.
translation.it: Mi servono soldi per diffondere l'amore di Cristo.

translation.en: -No need to get worked up about it. -Stay away from my family.
translation.it: - Calmati. - Sta' lontana dalla mia famiglia.

translation.en: Have a blessed night.
Oh, you too, sweetie.
Read the room, Hannah B. For the love of God, read the room.
translation.it: Per l'amor del cielo, Hannah B, svegliati.

translation.en: Hey, Sterl?
I wonder what Ellen would say if she knew
translation.it: Chissà cosa direbbe Ellen, se sapesse

translation.en: that while I was home making care packages for homeless teens,
translation.it: che mentre io ero a casa a preparare i pacchi dono per i senzatetto,

translation.en: her star Fellowship leader was spreading her legs for Luke Creswell
translation.it: la sua adorata responsabile apriva le gambe a Luke Creswell

translation.en: in the senior lot.
Gosh.
What would the whole school... say?
Hoarder.
It was fun while it lasted, Sterl, huh?
translation.it: È stato bello finché è durata.

translation.en: Our little life of badassery?
Just would have been nice if it ended after we got the money to pay back Mom and Dad.
translation.it: Meglio se finiva dopo aver raccolto i soldi per il pickup.

translation.en: Maybe we can get jobs at that other Yogurtopia on Peachtree.
translation.it: E se ci facessimo assumere nell'altra yogurteria?

translation.en: Might not suck so hard if we get the same shift.
"Hashtag April helps sick kids through Christ."
translation.it: April aiuta i bambini malati grazie a Cristo.

translation.en: What?
That's the hashtag of April's discipleship weekend.
Where she took that stupid helicopter to her lake house.
translation.it: Quando è andata alla casa sul lago.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Yeah.
I bet he is hiding out there.
But how do we find the address? Well, if April geo-tagged the photos, then--
translation.it: - Ma come la troviamo? - Se le foto sono geolocalizzate...

translation.en: [groans] Except she blocked me.
And her dad's account is private.
translation.it: E l'account del padre è privato.

translation.en: Unless...
Take one of me like this.
Sterling take-- Sterling.
Ster-- Sterling! What are you doing?
Fake account, sexy profile pics,
translation.it: Un account falso con foto sexy.

translation.en: send a follow request and...
translation.it: Invio una richiesta di amicizia e...

translation.en: And now we wait.
Yeah.
Top five... hottest guys at Willingham.
translation.it: I cinque... più fighi della Willingham.

translation.en: Besides Luke and Jennings?
[scoffs] Yeah. Of-- Of course...
The first one's easy, obviously. -Owen Caruthers. -Yeah. Chase Holten.
translation.it: - Il primo è Owen Caruthers. - Chase Holten.

translation.en: -What? No! -Eww.
Owen's, like, spooky hot.
translation.it: Owen è sexy in modo inquietante.

translation.en: Chase is, like, boring and hot.
translation.it: Chase è sexy in modo noioso.

translation.en: I like his hair-swoopy thing and he looks like he'd be a really good cuddler.
translation.it: Mi piace il suo ciuffo e sembra bravo a fare le coccole.

translation.en: Owen looks like he's going to die of some old-timey disease.
translation.it: Owen sembra in fin di vita per una malattia estinta.

translation.en: Yeah, I love that.
translation.it: Sì, e mi piace un sacco.

translation.en: -[cell phone chimes] -Hey.
Oh, dang, that was fast.
[chuckles] Clearly a boob man.
Okay, we have the address. Let's go!
Wait wait wait wait....
What about Fellowship?
What about April ruining your Christian reputation?
He beat up a prostitute.
Letting John Stevens walk around free of judgment?
That just wouldn't be the Christian thing to do.
Christ for the win!
Badassery reinstated.
It's coming up.
He's not in the den.
Dude...
Look. Look.
[Sterling] That must be him.
We're straight-up detectives.
It's so baller. I feel baller.
Adventure kind of makes me horny.
Everything makes you horny.
Come on.
-[Blair and Sterling grunt] -Dear Lord!
I want to say, Jessica?
[chuckling] What are you ladies doing here?
You know, you're lucky I didn't use my gun.
That's okay. We'll use ours.
Prostitute beater!
The hell are you doing?
-I'll have you arrested. What the hell? -[gun cocks]
translation.it: Vi farò arrestare! Ma che cazzo?

translation.en: Actually, Mr. Stevens, it's kind of the opposite.
translation.it: In realtà, signor Stevens, è il contrario.

translation.en: We're having you arrested.
-We'll have you arrested. -What?
Remember when you thought it would be cool to cheat on your wife with a prostitute and then beat her up?
translation.it: Si ricorda quando è andato con una prostituta e l'ha picchiata?

translation.en: Turns out, not so cool.
translation.it: Non è stata una bella idea.

translation.en: -Yeah, not so cool. -You little cunts.
-[girls gasp] -"Little C-words?"
Mr. Stevens, you crossed a line. That's nasty.
translation.it: Ha oltrepassato il limite. Che schifo.

translation.en: Guess what else is nasty?
I've peed in your pool.
translation.it: Ho fatto la pipì in piscina.

translation.en: A bunch.
How dare you? Get out of my way!
Oh, nice move, goalie.
[Blair] Yeah. Gave him the old "Wesley check".
By the way, my name is Blair, bitch.
translation.it: A proposito, mi chiamo Blair, stronzo.

translation.en: -Can you "drink" me? -Yep.
God, I'm still absolutely starving.
translation.it: Dio, sto ancora morendo di fame.

translation.en: -I've literally never been hungrier. -[groans]
Oh, y'all gonna be sorry.
Hey, Mr. Stevens? Could you shut the fuck up?
translation.it: Signor Stevens, che ne dice di chiudere il becco?

translation.en: ...and we asked about the help wanted poster.
And he, like, hired us on the spot.
Another great thing is the hours are flexible and they're open late.
translation.it: L'orario è flessibile e sono aperti fino a tardi.

translation.en: So, instead of going to parties, you can go to work.
translation.it: Invece di andare alle feste, lavorerete.

translation.en: That sounds fair.
So tell me, what's the pay?
-Oh. -Oh. I think it's like, um...
like a hundred...
Fifty?
A hundred fifty dollars an hour?
-[Sterling] Oh, no-- -[Blair] Dollars? No.
-Like, dimes an hour. -Yeah.
Obviously.
-That's fifteen bucks an hour. -Yeah.
[Blair] Right? Because when in, um--
Hi, Mr. Bowser! Meet our parents.
Hey.
-Hi! -[Bowser] All right.
Yeah, all right. Gotta get this... [mumbling]
Oh, hey, you know, hey. The kids...
Uh, they're good.
Uh, good job. Yeah.
-They're all right. -[Bowser] Yes, all right.
[chuckling] All right. Well, we will see y'all at home.
-Yeah. -Be safe.
Blair, honey, don't you think maybe you should tie your hair back?
translation.it: Blair, tesoro, non è meglio se ti leghi i capelli?

translation.en: You know, being around all this food.
Yeah. Yes, Mama.
Okay. Oh, nice to meet you.
Uh... toodle-oo, then.
Take care, Miss Cathy.
-Love you! -Bye! -[Debbie] Love y'all. -Drive safe.
Sterling, who am I?
Well, hey, who am I?
No, her hand's... Her hand's here.
translation.it: No, devi mettere la mano qui.

translation.en: Ah, Jesus.
What's happening? Did y'all pay for that?
You can just take it out of our fifty percent.
Okay, girls, you need to understand that there's a seniority in this business,
translation.it: Ok, dovete capire che in questo settore l'anzianità conta.

translation.en: and I've been doing it much longer than you have,
translation.it: Io lavoro da molto più di voi,

translation.en: so that has earned me a certain level of status, see?
translation.it: quindi mi sono guadagnato un certo status.

translation.en: So I'll give you 2K
and the name of my guy who'll fix your truck up for you cheap.
translation.it: e il nome di un amico che vi sistemerà l'auto a poco.

translation.en: Well, what if we don't accept that?
Oh, this is you playing hardball?
-Sure. -[chuckles] Okay.
Seeing as how you're underage
and can't secure a license to bounty hunt,
translation.it: e non potete procurarvi una licenza,

translation.en: if you want to keep working with me,
I don't think you have any options but to accept my terms.
translation.it: dovete per forza accettare le mie condizioni.

translation.en: So, you want to keep working with us?
I suppose I could, uh, see your potential
to broaden my access around these parts.
Oh, Jesus. [woman] Yelp says you don't close until eleven.
translation.it: - Cristo. - Yelp dice che siete aperti.

translation.en: -So does your voicemail. -Goddamn it.
translation.it: - E anche la segreteria. - Porca troia.

translation.en: Visors on, let's go.
Come on.
And put that hair in a bun or somethin'. Fix it up.
[Blair] You sound like my mom.
